name: NKIssue
desc: An instance of the NKIssue class represents an issue of a newsstand content application.DeprecatedUse remote notifications to download content silently in the background. For information, see Pushing Background Updates to Your App.

items.name: func addAsset(with: URLRequest) -> NKAssetDownload
items.desc: Adds an asset to the list of assets to be downloaded and returns an instance representing that asset.

items.name: var downloadingAssets: [NKAssetDownload]
items.desc: Returns the assets that are currently downloading for the newsstand issue.

items.name: var contentURL: URL
items.desc: The location in the application sandbox where issue content should be stored.

items.name: var status: NKIssueContentStatus
items.desc: The status of the newsstand issue.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The date of the newsstand issue.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the newsstand issue.

items.name: enum NKIssueContentStatus
items.desc: The status of the newsstand issue.

items.name: static let NKIssueDownloadCompleted: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when all assets of the issue have been downloaded.
